name: SmartGCEV2
0:
”Alexa, switch light on”
”Alexa, open shutter to eighteen percent”
”Alexa, switch off home”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill allows you to control your SmartGCE ipx800 v4 and v5 hardware.
To do this, you must have a SmartGCE account and obtain the hardware.
There are currently 4 types of widgets that you can control from this skill via voice orders :
* Light: On, Off
* Brightness: 0 to 100%
* Plug: On, Off
* Rolling shutter: 0 to 100%
Or even open and close a roller shutter.
The skill content is in English.
